description:
Lulu`s Marill helps Lulu run a berry farm near Suiren Town in the Sinnoh region. Dawn`s Pochama found Lulu`s Marill attractive and tried to impress it until a wild Elekid intervened. Marill was captured by Team Rocket as they were spotted by Marill attempting to steal berries from the farm. Pochama and the wild Elekid managed to help rescue Marill from Team Rocket.
As Dawn was leaving, her Pochama got advice from Brock telling it to be strong as it could see that Elekid and Marill were becoming closer friends.
name: Maril (Lulu)
